name: ListEmailTemplates
description:
Lists all supported email templates for a brand.

Use this tool to retrieve all supported email templates for a specified brand in Okta. It is helpful when you need to review or manage the email templates available for customization.

parameters.name: brand_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the brand for which to list email templates.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor used for pagination, obtained from the response header, to continue from the current position in the list.

value_schema.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

parameters.name: result_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of email templates to return.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

parameters.name: include_additional_metadata
parameters.description: Array of strings specifying additional metadata to include in the response.

value_schema.description: Specifies additional metadata to be included in the response
